name: JMo Security Dev
postCreateCommand:
pip install -r requirements-dev.txt || true && bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; apt-get update && apt-get install -y jq curl git && 
  # gitleaks
  curl -sSL https://github.com/gitleaks/gitleaks/releases/latest/download/gitleaks-linux-amd64 -o /usr/local/bin/gitleaks && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/gitleaks && 
  # trufflehog
  curl -sSfL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/trufflesecurity/trufflehog/main/scripts/install.sh | sh -s -- -b /usr/local/bin && 
  # semgrep
  pip install --no-cache-dir semgrep'
